Attributes.description: Meteorology and climatology at the micro-, local, and meso-scales. Interactions between land surfaces and atmosphere. Basics of atmospheric turbulence and transfer processes. Microclimates on scales of a leaf to those of a large valley.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 200, GEOS 200, GEOB 204, GEOS 204, ATSC 201.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Geography, Room: 101
